title: Patient Encounter Workflow
description: Interactive swimlane diagram illustrating the complete patient encounter journey from arrival through billing, showing parallel activities across patient, clinical staff, clinical systems, and administrative systems with data capture points and decision logic
subject: Healthcare Data Management
creator: Claude AI with Mermaid Generator Skill
audience: Healthcare IT Students, Health Information Management Professionals, Medical Coding Students, Healthcare Administrators
cognitive_level: Students can analyze the dependencies between clinical documentation and billing processes, trace data flows across systems, and evaluate impacts of data quality issues
learning_objectives: Identify the four primary domains in patient encounter workflows
Trace data flow from registration through payment posting
Explain data captured at each workflow step
Recognize decision points that determine workflow paths
Describe how clinical documentation drives billing processes
List healthcare data standards used in the workflow
Identify common pain points and data quality issues
Understand timing and dependencies between clinical and financial workflows
learningObjectives: Understand the key concepts of patient encounter workflow
Explore patient encounter workflow through interactive visualization
Apply knowledge of patient encounter workflow to solve problems
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on patient encounter workflow
